com.googlecode.transloader
Class InvocationDescription

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.transloader.InvocationDescription

public final class InvocationDescription
extends Object

Describes a method invocation by method name, parameter type names and parameters.

Author:
Jeremy Wales

Constructor Summary

          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given Method and parameters.
InvocationDescription(String methodName)
          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name.
InvocationDescription(String methodName, Class[] parameterTypes, Object[] parameters)
          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter types and parameters.

          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type and parameter.

          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name and parameter.

          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name and parameters.

          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type name and parameter.
InvocationDescription(String methodName, String parameterTypeName, Object parameter)
          Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type name and parameter.
 
Method Summary
 String getMethodName()
          Gets the name of the method to be invoked.
 Object[] getParameters()
          Gets the parameters to be passed to the method to be invoked.
 String[] getParameterTypeNames()
          Gets the names of the parameter types of the method to be invoked.

Constructor Detail

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a zero-parameter method

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             Object parameter)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name and parameter.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a single-parameter method
parameter - a parameter whose concrete implementation Class has the same name as its type declared in the targeted method (therefore cannot be null)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             Object[] parameters)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name and parameters.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a multi-parameter method
parameters - some parameters whose concrete implementation Classes have the same names as their types declared in the targeted method (therefore cannot contain nulls)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             Class parameterType,
                             Object parameter)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type and parameter.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a single-parameter method
parameterType - a Class whose name is the same as the parameter type declared in the method
parameter - the parameter to the method invocation (can be null)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             String parameterTypeName,
                             Object parameter)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type name and parameter.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a single-parameter method
parameterTypeName - the name of the parameter type declared in the method
parameter - the parameter to the method invocation (can be null)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             Class[] parameterTypes,
                             Object[] parameters)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter types and parameters.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a multi-parameter method
parameterTypes - some Classes whose names are the same as the parameter types declared in the targeted method
parameters - the parameters to the method invocation (cannot be but can contain null)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(String methodName,
                             String[] parameterTypeNames,
                             Object[] parameters)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given method name, parameter type name and parameter.

Parameters:
methodName - the name of a single-parameter method
parameterTypeNames - the names of the parameter types declared in the method (cannot be or contain null)
parameters - the parameters to the method invocation (cannot be but can contain null)

InvocationDescription

public InvocationDescription(Method method,
                             Object[] parameters)
Constructs an InvocationDescription with the given Method and parameters.

Parameters:
method - the Method to invoke
parameters - the parameters to the method invocation (can actually be null)

Returns:

Gets the names of the parameter types of the method to be invoked.

Returns:
